name: Fimbulvetr
description:
A short kinetic novel (~1k words) about two people trying to survive in a post-apocalyptic world. My first attempt at writing a VN, so don't expect anything great lol.

Made for the Winter VN Jam 2021.

Credits: 

Snowfall effects by tofurocks.

Background images from Pexels and Pixabay.

Sound effects from YouFulca and Pixabay.

Character sprites made with Mannequin.

Made with Ren'Py.
